file_content.text: You picked the wrong medbay to rob, vac-brain! There's gonna be two hundred Death's Claw pirates coming through that door!
Suits me fine.
And?
Unlikely and unnecessary.
Uh-uh. You see these guys lying here? They've got the rakghoul plague.
You touch me, and they'll be on you like Hutts on a buffet. Except, you know... faster.
And don't think they're incapacitated. They just look that way. I've got a serum you wouldn't believe.
Then you won't mind contributing it to science.
Good. Hand it over.
There's no need for bravado. I'm only here for the serum.
Calm down.
I know a Republic that could make use of that.
Great. I'll take it.
That serum's worth more to me than credits.
Glad you mentioned it, sucker.
There's not that many left. Trust me.
I killed an awful lot of them.
Wait, uh... wait, when I said you picked the wrong place to rob, I meant, uh, that we don't have a lot of money.
And it's true! Most of our manpower is laid up with the rakghoul plague.
If I'm not around to administer their serum treatment, it's going to be nothing but carapaces and claws in here.
Far more are suffering than just those inside this room. Give it here.
You can't keep the serum.
What is this? I'm getting robbed by Jedi? I thought you guys were allergic to credits or something!
We'll take credits. It's sniveling we don't tolerate.
Quit whining.
Less talk. More serum.
Get back on topic.
I've seen them make money. It's charm they're allergic to.
Not entirely true.
Don't make me mad.
If you cut off my supply of serum, these guys are going to turn. You know what that means?
You don't have serum. I have serum.
Hand it over.
Just give me the serum when the talking stops.
Yap, yap, yap.
I'd heard you dug something up. I'm going to need it.
So it works, does it?
Yeah, we've been using it to... wait. No, you don't. You can't take it! These people are infected!
So what?
Wait, wait, we don't have all that much. If you cut off my supply, these guys are going to turn. You know what that means?
I'm going to have to shoot them all in the head before they try to eat my liver.
You're a doctor, right? Synthesize some more.
So make more serum.
With what? My state-of-the-art facilities? I can only use what I find, and we don't find much.
The only place I can think of that might have some left is the ruins of Dynamet General. The place was basically ghoul town.
Then that's what will happen.
Wait, wait. That might not be entirely right. There's a place we couldn't get into--the ruins of Dynamet General.
Too bad.
Wait, wait, I remember one other place you could find it--the ruins of Dynamet General. We couldn't get in there.
The moment we got near, the rakghouls went berserk. It's one of their breeding grounds or something.
You want serum, you get it there and leave us alone.
I'll look there... once.
No, the stuff is down there. I swear on my medical license. The real one.
You've delayed long enough.
Serum. Now.
Fine, take it! But these people will die cursing you.
